evan1.description: Evan stayed with us for an evening. Felix went out of his way to show his guest a good time.
evan1.title: Evan 1

evan2.description: Both Felix and Evan love trains, trucks and books about them.
evan2.title: Evan 2

evan3.description: Look, Maisy the mouse (a.k.a. Mimi la sourie) is in a plane!
evan3.title: Evan 3

evan4.description: Evan calls it a "fire'gine", Felix calls it a "pompier"... whatever the name, fire engines are hot stuff around here.
evan4.title: Evan 4

halloween1.description: Felix didn't show much interest in the picking and the carving of the jack o' lantern, but he is very intrigued by the end product.
halloween1.title: Halloween 1

halloween2.description: This year, Felix is an astronaut.
halloween2.title: Halloween 2

halloween3.description: Dean's a legal alien, just like Lucie.
halloween3.title: Halloween 3

halloween4.description: There's even a removeable anti-gravity pack.
halloween4.title: Halloween 4

halloween6.description: Is the oxygen flowing? Let's check.
halloween6.title: Halloween 6

halloween7.description: Space men always double check their equipment.
halloween7.title: Halloween 7

halloween8.description:
Halloween morning, Felix licked his first lollipop and earned his first money.

Lucie and Astronaut Felix went to the corner store to get a pumpkin bucket, in preparation for trick or treating in the evening. On the way home, two passers-by put candy in his bucket, and a homeless man insisted on giving him a quarter.
halloween8.title: Halloween 8

richmond1.description: On Halloween morning, the Richmond recreation center was a quite a scene. Astronaut Felix did  feel like he had landed on a strange planet.
richmond1.title: Richmond 1

richmond2.description: Almost every kid wore a costume. The baby giraffe was particularly cute.
richmond2.title: Richmond 2

richmond3.description: Another favorite: a Spiderman with impressive muscles.
richmond3.title: Richmond 3

richmond4.description: Astronaut Felix and fellow space child Buzz Lightyear meet up at Mars Station.
richmond4.title: Richmond 4

trickortreat1.description: In the evening, the aliens and the astronaut went trick or treating with the Joyces.
trickortreat1.title: Trickortreat 1

trickortreat2.description: Keenan put together an amazing Star Trek Borg costume out of old computer parts, notebook spirals and other scraps that he had collected over the last 3 months. Many a candy-giver gave him an extra treat in appreciation.
trickortreat2.title: Trickortreat 2

trickortreat3.description:
Amanda (pink flamingo), Zoe (society lady) and Lucy (jelly fish).

No Halloween expedition is complete without a gaggle of girls high on the mere anticipation of the end-of-night sugar rush.
trickortreat3.title: Trickortreat 3

trickortreat4.description: Felix really got into trick or treating. He went to every door, picked a candy, said "thanks", then "bye bye". We even let him have a couple of lollipops, but the bulk of the booty was appropriated by his alien overlords.
trickortreat4.title: Trickortreat 4

trickortreat5.description: Oh. My. God!   Eleven pounds of candy! And that's just Amanda's!
trickortreat5.title: Trickortreat 5

trickortreat6.description:
Step one: gather candy.
Step two: weigh candy.
Step three: carefully organize it into candy species.

Presumably, there also comes a time when you eat the candy, but you have to savor each step.
trickortreat6.title: Trickortreat 6

winter1.description: The weather's been weird this week.  Monday saw record-breaking heat.  Wednesday was autumn.  Friday, it snowed just a little.
winter1.title: Winter 1

winter2.description: Dean and Felix enjoy the bracing air at the local coffee house.
winter2.title: Winter 2

winter3.description: Dean and Felix often give each other the giggles.
winter3.title: Winter 3

description: We've had a great week. Felix has been adorable. And Friday was our favorite American holiday, Halloween.
title: November 2
